name: Xip and Xander (Global Game Jam 2021)
description:
Story

As a utility android at Xeal Labs called X.A.N.D.E.R. (Xeal Artificial, Neural, Directive Executing Robot), you and an AI called X.I.P. (Xeal Intelligent Personality) complete puzzles at Xeal labs to test out their products.

This is a puzzle platformer.

Theme

Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021. Theme: Lost And Found.

Your skills are lost and found during the level. You can find Cores in the levels, which contain data on a specific skill. When you Pick up a Core you will gain its unique ability. When you Drop a Core you will lose this ability.

Xip also has a lost and found motif in their story, you'll have to play to find out.

Controls
  • Arrow keys: Move
  • 1-5: Use skill
  • Space: Pick up Core
  • QWERT: Drop Core
  • I: Restart Level
  • P: (Jam version only) Skip level
